price: "Vai, tu e teu irmão, com Meus sinais, e de nada descureis, em lembraça de Mim."
arabic: ٱذۡهَبۡ أَنتَ وَأَخُوكَ بِـَٔايَٰتِي وَلَا تَنِيَا فِي ذِكۡرِي

version.title: Portuguese Translation - Helmy Nasr
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Portugal by Dr. Helmy Nasr. Corrected by supervision of Rowwad Translation Center -1440.

meta.transliteration: idh'hab anta wa-akhūka biāyātī walā taniyā fī dhik'rī
